text: Will Smith To Perform At World Cup Closing Ceremony With Nicky Jam And Era Istrefi The artists will perform the FIFA World Cup's official track, ` ` Live It Up.'' Will Smith is having a big year. Aside from being the ` ` Fresh Prince of Instagram'' only seven months after joining the social network, he's also been tapped to perform at the World Cup's closing ceremony in Moscow. The multitalented entertainer will reportedly be performing his new single ` ` Live It Up'' alongside Nicky Jam and Russian singer Kosovar.
